overview: Susan Sweeney inherits a country hotel. When she arrives to take possession, she discovers it to be not the palatial resort she believed, but a run-down inn with an attached saloon. As she struggles to make something of her new operation, she becomes involved in the life and difficulties of her new community....
tagline: See How Dainty MAE MARSH Cleans out a Rough Road House In Her Latest Picture, "ALL WOMAN"
title: All Woman
